mapper.select: INSERT INTO t_ck_invalid_count_log(fCustomerKeywordUuid, fInvalidCount, fOptimizedDate) SELECT fUuid AS 'fCustomerKeywordUuid', (fQueryCount - fOptimizedCount), DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) FROM t_customer_keyword WHERE fStatus = 1 AND fType = 'qz'
SELECT fCustomerKeywordUuid FROM t_ck_invalid_count_log WHERE fInvalidCount > 15 AND fOptimizedDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) GROUP BY fCustomerKeywordUuid HAVING count(*) = 3
